name: Ángel Suárez Fernández
profession: Software Engineer, PhD in Social Science, Entrepreneur
summary:
A dedicated, persevering and self-motivated Software Engineer with 8 years of experience. PhD in Technology Enhanced Learning, passionate learner, with good analytical and problem solving skills. Helping IT teams to turn ideas into products through honesty, integrity & respect.

- Richard Feynman:"I think it's much more interesting to live not knowing than having answers which might be wrong."
